reviewText: I absolutely Love Blue Exorcist!! the only reason im giving 3 stars is the Blu ray case came in pretty crushed but thankfully the disk were just fine.
I would give this anime 4/5 stats but this blu ray does not freaking work on the USA and amazon didn't let get my money back $40 wasted
I didn't read much into what all I needed for this specific DVD. I need a region B player (wherever I can get that....) In order to play it. So now it just sits in my room. Oh well.

If you have a region free blue-ray player then this is one of the reasons you bought it. This portion of the series includes episodes 13-25. My only dissatisfaction lies in that most of the episodes are filler, but the more Blue Exorcist the better.
